result.title: plagiarism detector of hackerrank..!!
result.content:
Hi, everyone this is my first blog on codeforces. In this very first blog of mine I am curious to know about plagiarism detector algorithm that Hackerrank use. The reason being that yesterday i looked up to a contest on hackerrank which had a very nice set of problems which apparently i couldn't solve as i am new to competitive programming so i decided to look up the editorials and solutions of other top participants on leaderboard. During this process i found out many codes almost similar (examples are attached below in the link). I was startled by seeing this plagiarism of code and would like to know whether hackerrank will be able to detect this or not?

Contest link — https://www.hackerrank.com/visa-codeurway-2017

Question link — https://www.hackerrank.com/contests/visa-codeurway-2017/challenges/chang-dilemma

Solution link 1 — https://pastebin.com/6WsPmn2e

Solution link 2 — https://pastebin.com/ZKMuU811

As it is clearly visible that there is slight changes in comment and naming of few variables so how does hackerrank tackle this problem of plagiarism in such important contests?

New coder :)
